name: Sovietbot
tagline: Fun and Simple discord bot with support for youtube music streaming.
body:
#SovietBot

##Welcome to SovietBot's Website.

Is a [Discord](https://discordapp.com/) Bot written in Java. It uses the API [Discord4J](https://github.com/austinv11/Discord4J) for interfacing with Discord and [JDA Player](https://github.com/DV8FromTheWorld/JDA-Player).
SovietBot is under heavy constant development, but it is kept online almost all the time. expect about 5-10 minutes of downtime per day for maintenance and updating.

#####Invite Link
**<https://discordapp.com/oauth2/authorize?&client_id=184445488093724672&scope=bot&permissions=19950624>**

Feel free to invite this bot to your server, it has many great features, such as
1. Music Streaming from Youtube and Soundcloud
1. Removing up to 99 messages from chat at once
1. Per user Permissions: Normal, Regular, Moderator, and Admin.
1. Funneling pure **Dank** into voice channels
1. Telling "In Soviet Russia" jokes
   *and much more...*

##Credits
* The [Discord4J](https://discord.gg/NxGAeCY) community for providing guidance on the Discord4J API and Java in general. I could never have gotten this far without you guys!
* @chrislo27 for Giving me the basis of my webhooks module
* @austinv11 for maintaining and developing Discord4J
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
